org.microtitan.diffusive.diffuser.strategy

Class RandomWeightedDiffuserStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.microtitan.diffusive.diffuser.strategy.AbstractDiffuserStrategy
      • org.microtitan.diffusive.diffuser.strategy.RandomWeightedDiffuserStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.freezedry.persistence.copyable.Copyable<DiffuserStrategy>, DiffuserStrategy

    public class RandomWeightedDiffuserStrategy
extends AbstractDiffuserStrategy
    Selects an end-point based on a weighted distribution. This allows, for example, one end-point to be picked more often than another. By specifying a map of
    Author:
    Robert Philipp

    • Method Detail

      • getEndpoints

        public java.util.List<java.net.URI> getEndpoints()
        Returns:
        A list of end-point to which to send the next run/execute request. Each subsequent call should return an end-point based on the implementing classes strategy.
